scripts.install-next-electron: npm ci && cd electron && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.dev-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron
scripts.build-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && (cd electron && npx cap copy electron && npx electron-packager . --overwrite --icon ./assets/icon)
scripts.add-android: npm run build && npm run export && rm -rf ./android && npx cap add android
scripts.build-android: npm run build && npm run export && npx cap sync android
scripts.build-browser-extension-linux: npm run build && npm run export && mv ./out/_next ./out/next && cd ./out && grep -rl '/_next' * | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g' && cd ../ && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/next-assets extension/
scripts.build-browser-extension-mac: npm run build && npm run export && mv ./out/_next ./out/next && cd ./out && grep -rli '_next' * | xargs -I@ sed -i '' 's|/_next|/next|g' @; && cd ../ && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/next-assets extension/
